entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:04 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 3:30 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -14.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -21.7°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud except cloudy in onshore winds with flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
